en.about.page.title: About Me
en.about.page.subtitle: From Mozambique to Portugal: A Platform Engineer's Journey
en.about.myStory.title: My Story
en.about.myStory.p1: Born and raised in Maputo, Mozambique, my journey into technology began at the Portuguese School of Mozambique, where I discovered my passion for problem-solving and innovation. This passion led me to Portugal in 2016, where I pursued an Integrated Master's degree in Engineering and Management of Information Systems at the University of Minho.
en.about.myStory.p2: During my academic years, I discovered a fascination with how systems work at scale and how infrastructure enables amazing things to happen. What started as curiosity about technology grew into a genuine love for building reliable systems that make people's lives easier.
en.about.myStory.p3: Today, I work as a Platform Engineer at MC Digital (Sonae), where I get to combine my technical skills with my passion for solving real-world problems. Whether it's automating repetitive tasks or ensuring systems run smoothly, I find joy in the challenge of making complex things simple and reliable.
en.about.myStory.p4: Beyond the code and infrastructure, I'm driven by the belief that technology should be accessible and inclusive. My multicultural background—growing up in Mozambique and building my career in Portugal—has taught me the value of diverse perspectives in creating better solutions for everyone.
en.about.behindCode.title: Behind the Code
en.about.behindCode.subtitle: Life beyond the terminal
en.about.behindCode.foodbank.title: Food Bank Volunteer
en.about.behindCode.foodbank.desc: Helping families in need through food distribution at the Food Bank Against Hunger in Porto. Click to learn more about this experience.
en.about.behindCode.amma.title: Environmental Volunteer
en.about.behindCode.amma.desc: Contributing to ecosystem preservation through invasive species removal and tree planting with AMMA Matosinhos. Click to learn more about this initiative.
en.about.behindCode.cultural.title: Cultural Bridge
en.about.behindCode.cultural.desc: Growing up in Mozambique and now living in Portugal has given me a unique perspective on life and technology. I speak Portuguese natively, am fluent in English, and understand basic Spanish. This multicultural background helps me connect with diverse teams and bring different viewpoints to problem-solving.
en.about.behindCode.learning.title: Continuous Learning
en.about.behindCode.learning.desc: Technology evolves rapidly, and I love staying ahead of the curve. Whether it's exploring new cloud services, experimenting with emerging programming languages, or diving into the latest DevOps practices, I'm always learning. Currently fascinated by Infrastructure as Code patterns and the potential of AI in automating platform operations.
en.about.behindCode.interests.title: Interests & Hobbies
en.about.behindCode.interests.desc: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring Porto's vibrant tech meetups, hiking in the beautiful Portuguese countryside, or experimenting with home automation projects. I enjoy building Raspberry Pi projects, contributing to open-source initiatives, and occasionally playing strategy games that challenge my problem-solving skills in different ways.
en.about.behindCode.values.title: Values & Philosophy
en.about.behindCode.values.desc: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code that others can understand and build upon. Automation should eliminate repetitive tasks, not complicate simple ones. Every technical decision should be driven by business value. And most importantly, technology should be inclusive and accessible to everyone, regardless of their background.
en.about.behindCode.goals.title: Future Goals
en.about.behindCode.goals.desc: Looking ahead, I aim to deepen my expertise in cloud-native architectures and contribute to large-scale distributed systems. I'm passionate about mentoring junior engineers and sharing knowledge through technical writing and speaking at conferences. My goal is to become a technical leader who bridges the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical business solutions.
en.about.modal.foodbank.title: Food Bank Against Hunger
en.about.modal.foodbank.subtitle: Social Action Volunteer | September 2024 | Porto, Portugal
en.about.modal.foodbank.p1: Volunteering at the Food Bank Against Hunger in Porto has been an incredibly rewarding experience. As part of the social action team, I contribute to ensuring food security for vulnerable populations in the Porto region.
en.about.modal.foodbank.activity1: Receiving and sorting food donations from local businesses and individuals
en.about.modal.foodbank.activity2: Organizing food items by category and expiration date for efficient distribution
en.about.modal.foodbank.activity3: Distributing food packages to families in need with dignity and respect
en.about.modal.foodbank.activity4: Collaborating with team members to streamline the logistics of food distribution
en.about.modal.foodbank.activity5: Supporting community initiatives that raise awareness about food waste and hunger
en.about.modal.foodbank.p2: This experience has taught me the importance of community solidarity and how small actions can make a significant difference in people's lives. It's a reminder that beyond technology and code, we all have a responsibility to contribute to our communities.
en.about.modal.amma.title: AMMA - Matosinhos Environment
en.about.modal.amma.subtitle: Environmental Volunteer | November 2024 | Matosinhos, Portugal
en.about.modal.amma.p1: Through Matosinhos City Council's environmental program AMMA (Association for the Environment of Matosinhos), I've been actively involved in protecting and preserving local ecosystems.
en.about.modal.amma.activity1: Participated in invasive species removal projects to protect native biodiversity
en.about.modal.amma.activity2: Helped plant native tree species to restore natural habitats
en.about.modal.amma.activity3: Learned about local flora and fauna and the importance of ecosystem balance
en.about.modal.amma.activity4: Contributed to environmental education initiatives in the community
en.about.modal.amma.activity5: Worked alongside environmental experts and passionate volunteers
en.about.modal.amma.p2: This hands-on environmental work has deepened my appreciation for nature and sustainability. It's shown me that protecting our environment requires active participation from everyone, and that even small contributions can help preserve our planet for future generations.

pt.about.page.subtitle: De Moçambique para Portugal: A Jornada de um Platform Engineer
pt.about.myStory.title: A Minha História
pt.about.myStory.p1: Nascido e criado em Maputo, Moçambique, a minha jornada na tecnologia começou na Escola Portuguesa de Moçambique, onde descobri a minha paixão por resolução de problemas e inovação. Esta paixão levou-me a Portugal em 2016, onde segui um Mestrado Integrado em Engenharia e Gestão de Sistemas de Informação na Universidade do Minho.
pt.about.myStory.p2: Durante os meus anos académicos, descobri um fascínio por como os sistemas funcionam em escala e como a infraestrutura permite que coisas incríveis aconteçam. O que começou como curiosidade sobre tecnologia cresceu num amor genuíno por construir sistemas fiáveis que facilitam a vida das pessoas.
pt.about.myStory.p3: Hoje, trabalho como Platform Engineer na MC Digital (Sonae), onde consigo combinar as minhas competências técnicas com a minha paixão por resolver problemas do mundo real. Seja a automatizar tarefas repetitivas ou a garantir que os sistemas funcionam suavemente, encontro alegria no desafio de tornar coisas complexas simples e fiáveis.
pt.about.myStory.p4: Para além do código e infraestrutura, sou movido pela crença de que a tecnologia deve ser acessível e inclusiva. O meu background multicultural—crescer em Moçambique e construir a minha carreira em Portugal—ensinou-me o valor de perspetivas diversas na criação de melhores soluções para todos.

pt.about.behindCode.cultural.title: Ponte Cultural
pt.about.behindCode.cultural.desc: Crescer em Moçambique e agora viver em Portugal deu-me uma perspetiva única sobre a vida e a tecnologia. Falo português nativamente, sou fluente em inglês e compreendo espanhol básico. Este background multicultural ajuda-me a conectar com equipas diversas e trazer pontos de vista diferentes para a resolução de problemas.
pt.about.behindCode.learning.title: Aprendizagem Contínua
pt.about.behindCode.learning.desc: A tecnologia evolui rapidamente, e adoro estar à frente da curva. Seja a explorar novos serviços cloud, a experimentar linguagens de programação emergentes, ou a mergulhar nas últimas práticas DevOps, estou sempre a aprender. Atualmente fascinado por padrões de Infraestrutura como Código e o potencial da IA na automação de operações de plataforma.
pt.about.behindCode.interests.title: Interesses & Hobbies
pt.about.behindCode.interests.desc: Quando não estou a programar, encontram-me a explorar os vibrantes meetups de tecnologia do Porto, a fazer caminhadas na bela paisagem portuguesa, ou a experimentar projetos de automação doméstica. Gosto de construir projetos com Raspberry Pi, contribuir para iniciativas open-source, e ocasionalmente jogar jogos de estratégia que desafiam as minhas capacidades de resolução de problemas de diferentes formas.
pt.about.behindCode.values.title: Valores & Filosofia
pt.about.behindCode.values.desc: Acredito em escrever código limpo e manutenível que outros possam entender e desenvolver. A automação deve eliminar tarefas repetitivas, não complicar as simples. Cada decisão técnica deve ser orientada por valor empresarial. E mais importante, a tecnologia deve ser inclusiva e acessível a todos, independentemente do seu background.
pt.about.behindCode.goals.title: Objetivos Futuros
pt.about.behindCode.goals.desc: Olhando para o futuro, pretendo aprofundar a minha experiência em arquiteturas cloud-native e contribuir para sistemas distribuídos em larga escala. Sou apaixonado por mentorar engenheiros juniores e partilhar conhecimento através de escrita técnica e palestras em conferências. O meu objetivo é tornar-me um líder técnico que faça a ponte entre tecnologia de ponta e soluções práticas de negócio.
